languages.text: "Я... слуга... Омниссии... Я... воин... Его... Плоть... ненадежна. Но Ритуал... почитает Дух Машины!"
"I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"
languages.original_text: "Я... слуга... Омниссии... Я... воин... Его... Плоть... ненадежна. Но Ритуал... почитает Дух Машины!"

traits.locale_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... Honours the Machine Spirit!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「自分は…万機神の…しもべ。自分は…主の…戦士。肉体は…不完全である。だが儀式は…機械精霊を称えるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"

traits.locale_text: 「自分は…万機神の…しもべ。自分は…主の…戦士。肉体は…不完全である。だが儀式は…機械精霊を称えるのだ！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我是……欧姆尼塞亚……的仆人……是祂的……战士……血肉……孱弱不堪，但仪式……向机魂致敬！”
languages.original_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"

traits.locale_text: “我是……欧姆尼塞亚……的仆人……是祂的……战士……血肉……孱弱不堪，但仪式……向机魂致敬！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Soy... un siervo... del Omnissiah... Soy... su... guerrero... La carne... es falible. ¡Pero el Ritual... honra al espíritu máquina!».
languages.original_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"

traits.locale_text: «Soy... un siervo... del Omnissiah... Soy... su... guerrero... La carne... es falible. ¡Pero el Ritual... honra al espíritu máquina!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin ... der Diener ... des Omnissiah ... Ich bin ... sein ... Krieger ... Fleisch ... ist fehleranfällig. Aber Ritual ... ehrt den Maschinengeist!"
languages.original_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ... der Diener ... des Omnissiah ... Ich bin ... sein ... Krieger ... Fleisch ... ist fehleranfällig. Aber Ritual ... ehrt den Maschinengeist!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis... le serviteur... de l'Omnimessie... Je suis... Son... guerrier... La chair... est faillible. Mais le rituel... honore l'esprit de la machine ! »
languages.original_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis... le serviteur... de l'Omnimessie... Je suis... Son... guerrier... La chair... est faillible. Mais le rituel... honore l'esprit de la machine ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ben... Hermesih'in... Hizmetkârıyım... Ben... O'nun... Savaşçısıyım... Beden... Şaşabilir. Ancak Ayin... Makine Ruhu'na şeref verir!"
languages.original_text: "I am... the Omnissiah's... servant... I am... His... warrior... Flesh... is fallible. But Ritual... honours the Machine Spirit!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Hermesih'in... Hizmetkârıyım... Ben... O'nun... Savaşçısıyım... Beden... Şaşabilir. Ancak Ayin... Makine Ruhu'na şeref verir!"
